questions.title: Q001 [10133098] In an experiment, potato strips of the same size
questions.prompt:
[10133098]
In an experiment, potato strips of the same size were cut from a potato and immersed in sucrose solutions of different concentrations for 1 day. The ratio of initial mass to final mass of each potato strip was calculated and the results were presented in a graph. Which of the following graphs shows the results of the experiment?

questions.title: Q006 [10133153] Directions: The following two questions refer to
questions.prompt:
[10133153]
Directions: The following two questions refer to the investigation below. Beetroot cells contain a red pigment in the vacuoles. A student cut some cubes (1 cm x 1 cm x 1 cm) from a beetroot and washed them in running water for 20 minutes. The cubes were then put into test tubes containing distilled water and alcohol of different concentrations (W, X, Y and Z) for 30 minutes. The table below shows the colour intensity of the solutions after 30 minutes.

questions.title: Q007 Which alcohol is highest in concentration?
